title: WALL OF UDAYAGIRI COLLAPSES WHILE OTHERS LIKE  RATNAGIRI PLUNDERED AND NEGLECTED
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana The Times of India has reported  a section of the wall of the 8th century Buddhist monastery at Jajpur’s Udayagiri collapsed recently. Another national newspaper, the HINDU has blamed the government of India for lack of interest in preserving the Buddhist center for some time and has been complaining…
